workshoptitle: Introduction to Oracle Machine Learning Services

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Machine Learning Notebooks.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Authenticate Your User Account with Your Autonomous Database Instance to Use OML Services
Lab 2: Deploy and score an ONNX Format Model
Lab 3: Use the Cognitive Image Functionality to Score a Mini Batch Containing base64 Encoded String
Lab 4: Create and Run a Data Bias Detection Job
Lab 5: Create and Run a Data Monitoring Job
Lab 6: Create and Run a Model Monitoring Job
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
